PopIt documentation

PopIt is a way to create, store and share key facts about people, especially their job titles, photo, contact details and career histories

Theme modified from orderedlist/minimal

Installation instructions

We hope that PopIt is quite easy to install and get running. If you have any issues please let us know at popit@mysociety.org or by reporting it on the GitHub issue tracker.

Just want a PopIt site?

We run a free PopIt hosting service - if you just want to create a site to put data in that might be a better option. If you want to run your own, or contribute to the code then read on!

Platforms

There are specific install instructions for some platforms:

  • MacOS X
  • Ubuntu
  • Vagrant

Configuration

See the configuration notes.

Developers

In addition to these notes please see the contributing notes if you want to work on the code.
